summary: A ski-shop owner reluctantly moves himself, his wife, and his daughter in to an estate as live-in help for an elderly widow. While struggling to balance his career and family life, he has recurring dreams about an angel.
cast: Richard Thomas|Maureen O'Hara|Annette O'Toole|Kelsey Mulrooney|Robert Curtis Brown|Michael Ensign|Greg Brouwer|Nicole Forester|Lily Gibson
title: The Christmas Box
